## DatabaseMonitor.release() method

Release the instance back to the provider after it is no longer needed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
release(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`void`

## Remarks

The monitor instance becomes unusable after this method call.

Note, that throwing error from this method normally leads to the application crash.
